title: Classroom Confessions: Anthology
description: ****Teachers Fantasizing and living out their Fantasy's with other Teachers****Unabashed sexual frustrationsconjure up steamy desires as these onetime students become teachers themselvesand realize the faculty is too HOT to resist. Once the students have all gonehome, it's the teachers that have some Erotic lessons for each other that canno longer be contained. Take a look into some after school "Activities" thatwill leave you wanting more.Contains: Erotic short stories that leave you wanting more.
author: Ciara Ryan
